entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse Where is the part of the footage that his police pushed away clergy of the diocese there giving water and respite to protesters. Oh and we know this is a "squirrel" moment to try and get people to forget 105,000 people have died of Covid19 because of your inaction.
